greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (1+x)^2/(1+x+x^2).
comment: Row sums of the Riordan array ((1+x)/(1+x+x^2),x/(1+x)), A106509.
Equals INVERT transform of (1, -2, 3, -4, 5, ...). - _Gary W. Adamson_, Oct 10 2008
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-1,-1).
formula: a(n) is multiplicative with a(3^e) = 0^e, a(p^e) = 1 if p == 1 (mod 3), a(p^e) = (-1)^e if p == 2 (mod 3).
G.f. A(x) satisfies 0=f(A(x), A(x^2)) where f(u, v) = 4 - 3*v - u * (4 - 2*v - u). (End)
a(-n) = a(n). a(n+3) = a(n) unless n = 0 or n = -3.
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n==0, 1, kronecker(-3, n))} \\ _Michael Somos_, Oct 15 2008
results.author: _Paul Barry_, May 04 2005
